Package Classes

Class Total

  • java.lang.Object
    • Classes.Total
  • public class Total
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the Total object for usage to track Appointment totals.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Total> allTotals  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Total​(java.time.Month month, java.lang.String type)
      This method is the constructor for the Total object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void AddOrRemoveAppointment​(Appointment a, boolean del)
      This method modifies the list of totals when adding or removing an Appointment.
      java.lang.String getMonthString()
      This method is the getter for the String value of the Month of the Appointments to be totaled, mostly used for tables.
      int getTotal()
      This method is the getter for the total of the combination of Month and Type, mostly used for tables.
      java.lang.String getType()
      This method is the getter for the Type of Appointment to be totaled.
      static void ModifyAppointment​(Appointment tempAppointment, java.time.Month newMonth, java.lang.String newType)
      This method handles changing the totals upon modifying an Appointment.
      static void setAllTotals()
      This method is designed to be used on setup, to get an initial list of totals from the Appointments.

        public static final javafx.collections.ObservableList<Total> allTotals

    • Constructor Detail

      • Total

        public Total​(java.time.Month month,
             java.lang.String type)
        This method is the constructor for the Total object.
        Parameters:
        month - The Month the Appointment starts in to have its total calculated.
        type - The Type of Appointment to have its total calculated.

    • Method Detail

      • ModifyAppointment

        public static void ModifyAppointment​(Appointment tempAppointment,
                                     java.time.Month newMonth,
                                     java.lang.String newType)
        This method handles changing the totals upon modifying an Appointment.
        Parameters:
        tempAppointment - The old Appointment.
        newMonth - The Month of the new Apppointment.
        newType - The Type of the new Appointment.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        This method is the getter for the Type of Appointment to be totaled.
        Returns:
        The Type of Appointment.

      • getTotal

        public int getTotal()
        This method is the getter for the total of the combination of Month and Type, mostly used for tables.
        Returns:
        The Total number for the Month and Type of Appointment.

      • getMonthString

        public java.lang.String getMonthString()
        This method is the getter for the String value of the Month of the Appointments to be totaled, mostly used for tables.
        Returns:
        The String value of the Month.

      • setAllTotals

        public static void setAllTotals()
        This method is designed to be used on setup, to get an initial list of totals from the Appointments.

      • AddOrRemoveAppointment

        public static void AddOrRemoveAppointment​(Appointment a,
                                          boolean del)
        This method modifies the list of totals when adding or removing an Appointment.
        Parameters:
        a - The Appointment being added or removed.
        del - A boolean which if true signifies a deletion as opposed to an addition.
